name: Lavender Jones
description: Lavender Jones, also called Purple Jones, is a hybrid strain that expresses itself in vibrant hues of purple and green. Its Purple Urkle parent passes on more than just its colorful display and dense bud structure; deep relaxation typical of indica varieties comes through, coupled with dreamy cerebral euphoria inherited from its hybrid parent, Casey Jones.
descriptionPlain: Lavender Jones, also called Purple Jones, is a hybrid strain that expresses itself in vibrant hues of purple and green. Its Purple Urkle parent passes on more than just its colorful display and dense bud structure; deep relaxation typical of indica varieties comes through, coupled with dreamy cerebral euphoria inherited from its hybrid parent, Casey Jones.

highlightedReviews.text:
Lavender Jones. Tread with ease. Read on (newcomers: see note about paranoia)

I bought this at the advice of my budtender at Altitude Littleton. I requested something that's good for stimulating the creative juices, and he suggested this. Buds are fuzzy and dense with a nice purple hue to them. Pleasant scent of lavender, pine, with a hint of oak. It does not have a skunky or kushy smell to it, and the scent profile seems sativa influenced.

When smoked, the flavor is quite pleasant and this smokes easily. I rarely cough with this strain, even with a super tiny pipe. It hits hard and fast in the head first, but the body effects subtly grow to be very potent.  This can make this strain a bit too potent for some people as they will smoke more than they can handle.

The head effects typically lead me to constantly smile. I feel at ease, socialable. When smoked at high doses, it can be disorienting and almost feel hallucinogenic. Paranoia is a big deal with this strain - likely the worst in that category I've ever experienced among strains - new users, take note before you try this! 

The body effects creep up on you, starting with a subtle couchlock amplifying to waves of sensation flowing through you. It can be overwhelming, even for an experienced user (I consider myself to be a significant smoker and this blew me away), so be careful, dont even think about driving, and see if you can last through a horror movie without screaming out loud while high on this.

You won't be able to. 

On a serious note, this is a great strain, but it's not an appropriate strain for a patient with severe anxiety.

This bud is amazing! The aroma is strong lavender, with a hint of oak. The smoke is smooth and is not harsh at all. Definitley one of the stronger strains ive had, as this one put me to the couch for awhile, then you get the body waves. Great all around.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Frankenstein, Lavender Jones, Purple Paralysis, Space Jill, and Sugar Kush
articles.author: Kayla Williams
articles.text:
Based on submissions made by Leafly users, we've added Frankenstein, Lavender Jones, Purple Paralysis, Space Jill, and Sugar Kush to the Leafly Explorer. Keep 'em coming! Also, we've got plently more new strains on the way, so stay tuned. In the meantime, leave a strain review if you've had the chance to try any of these new varieties, and let us know which strains you'd love for us to add next so we can make sure we don't forget any of your favorites!
1. Frankenstein
Characteristics of Frankenstein:

80% indica
Unknown lineage
Recommended for consumers with a high cannabis tolerance or patients with severe symptoms
Genetics gave rise to Opal OG Kush, Copper Kush, Sweet Lafayette, and OG's Pearl

2. Lavender Jones
Characteristics of Lavender Jones:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Casey Jones and Purple Urkle
Buds express themselves in vibrant hues of purple and green
Can bring deep relaxation paired with dreamy cerebral euphoria
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

3. Purple Paralysis
Characteristics of Purple Paralysis:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Also known as Jellyfish Bud
Cross between Power Plant and Lavender
Breeder: Cream of the Crop
Hashy lavender aroma
Has potently energizing effects
Indoor flowering time of about 67 days

4. Space Jill
Characteristics of Space Jill:

70% sativa strain
Cross between Romulan and Cinderella 99
Recreation of the Space Queen strain
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Sweet mango and candy aroma
Can bring high-energy, creative, productive effects

5. Sugar Kush
Characteristics of Sugar Kush:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Kandy Kush and Hash Plant
Indoor flowering time of 9 weeks
